1. Read MeÂ¶

The OpenMOOC OpenMOOC Guide: Creating Courses guide is created using RST files and Sphinx. You, the user community, can help update and revise this documentation project on GitHub:

https://github.com/javivigu/openmooc-guide-creating-courses/_build/html/

To suggest a revision, fork the project, make changes in your fork, and submit a pull request back to the original project: this is known as the GitHub Flow. All pull requests need approval from OpenMOOC. For more information, contact OpenMOOC at info@openmooc.org.
